title: Fantastic Planet
review: This is a psychedelic music animation like Yellow Submarine. I liked the music in it and found myself enjoying it whenever the band was playing, but a little bored when they weren't. The animation is sometimes good, but some closeups look a bit weird and there were maybe too many exposed breasts for me to be able to recommend this without seeming weird. I'm glad I saw it but can't imagine watching it again.
